verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallowed be the name, of Jesus, Holy is the Lamb, Lord Jesus. Other kingdoms rise and fall, But You reigneth over all. Hallowed be the name of Jesus.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious is the blood, of Jesus Blessed Son of God, Lord Jesus You have washed away our sin, Given grace to enter in. Precious is the blood of Jesus.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy is the Lamb, Lord Jesus Righteous I can stand in Jesus We were chained to death, but then You raised us up again, Worthy is the Lamb, Lord Jesus.{/lang-eng}
